title: GO FOR IT
description: Play this card to advance your token immediately to the GO space and collect your reward as usual.

title: TREAT YO'SELF
description: Play this card so the next time you land on the Go to Animal Sanctuary space, you move directly to GO instead. Collect your GO reward as usual.

title: GET OUT OF JAIL FREE
description: Play this card to reject a prompt and roll again without being jailed (no 2-book penalty).

title: MOOD SWING
description: Play this card to DNF a book without having to select a new book to finish the prompt.

title: PLOT TWIST
description: Play this card to gain a reroll!

title: SKELETON KEY
description: Play this card to replace your current prompt with any other prompt on the board for this turn only.

title: THE SCENIC ROUTE
description: Play this card to advance to the Seasonal Read space of the current season. Collect your GO reward if you pass GO.

title: READING SPRINT
description: Play this card to advance 3 spaces and complete that prompt instead.

title: TIME SERVED
description: Play this card to receive credit for time served. If you are in Jail for a rejection, you only have to finish the first book to clear the prompt.

title: BUDDY READ
description: Play this card to choose any book a friend has read this calendar year (2026) to read; it fulfills your current prompt regardless of the space you're on.

title: GIFT CARD
description: Play this card to choose any book you've been rabid to read; it fulfills your current prompt regardless of the space you're on.

title: ESCAPE ARTIST
description: Play this card to skip your current prompt entirely and roll again.

title: COVER GIRL
description: Play this card to choose a book with a cover you find irresistible; it fulfills your current prompt regardless of the space you're on.

title: TIME WARP
description: Play this card to swap your current prompt for the one directly across the board from it (do not move your token; just read a book for the other prompt).

title: DIVERSIFY
description: Play this card to advance immediately to the Diversity Read space. Collect your GO reward if you pass GO.

title: PROPERTY VALUE
description: Play this card to swap your current prompt for a prompt on any property of the same color as your current space (do not move your token; just read a book for the other prompt). This card can only be used on property spaces.

title: COMMUNITY SERVICE
description: Play this card to advance immediately to the Animal Sanctuary to volunteer. Because you are arriving by choice, you may collect your GO reward on the way.

title: SIDE-EYE
description: Play this card to swap your current prompt for any other prompt located on the same side of the board as your current space (do not move your token; just read a book for the other prompt).

title: SEASONS GREETINGS
description: Play this card to advance to the next nearest Seasonal Read space. Collect your GO reward if you pass GO.

title: POWER SURGE
description: Play this card to advance to the next nearest Utility (Water Works or Electric Company) space. Collect your GO reward if you pass GO.

title: DOUBLE DIVIDEND
description: Play this card to collect a second reward the next time you pass GO.

title: CURRENT EVENTS
description: Play this card to choose any book you've added to your TBR this calendar year (2026) to read; it fulfills your current prompt regardless of what space you're on.

title: SPOILER ALERT
description: Play this card to look ahead at the next 3 spaces on the board and choose any of those spaces to advance to. Collect your GO reward if you pass GO.

title: PAROLE
description: Play this card to choose any prompt on the board to fulfill your second-book penalty if you are under a Jail penalty (the first book must be the prompt for the space you're currently on).

title: SELECTIVE MEMORY
description: Play this card to choose any Chance prompt to replace your current prompt.
